Text: You highlight all .rar files, extract into one folder, and do the same with those extracted. The result is the installer and a folder with the cracked .exe for the program. Just move the cracked .exe into the programs folder, replacing the original.

Extract all the rar files in to one folder then there should be one more rar extract the contents to that same folder run the installer then copy the contents from the FAnTAST folder to your installation folder.
